scripts.bitcoinjs-lib: (cd src/vendors/bitcoinjs-lib && npm install) && browserify --standalone bitcoinjs src/vendors/bitcoinjs-lib/src/index.js | uglifyjs -c --mangle reserved=['BigInteger','ECPair','Point'] -o src/vendors/bitcoinjs-lib/bitcoinjs.min.js
scripts.build: npm run bower && npm run bitcoinjs-lib && npm run grunt
scripts.test: ./node_modules/mocha-phantomjs/bin/mocha-phantomjs test/test.html --ignore-ssl-errors=true --ignore-resource-errors --ssl-protocol=any # phantomjs has issues with counterwallet.io SSL cert
